name: Compass UoS
description: Welcome to Compass! Your empowering tool from the University of Sunderland for getting the answers you need. Use Compass to access information, get help and get supported during your time at the University of Sunderland, all from your smart phone or tablet!  Navigate our array of helpful features and tools with ease:  My Profile See information that the University has on hand to help with your enquiries  Take a look at your course information Check the addresses and phone numbers we have on file, and let us know if you need a change by opening an enquiry View what appointments you have coming up, see previous ones, and check if any are rescheduled   FAQs Search our FAQs covering a wide range of questions asked by students from across the University Get the answers you want with our expert FAQs, written by staff at the University Rate the answer provided and let us know what youve found useful, helping us to keep our FAQs relevant to your student journey  Make an Enquiry Create an enquiry to get the information you need Give us all the details you think well need to help by adding your own notes Add attachments to your enquiry to show us the whole picture  My Enquiries  Manage your open and closed enquiries from one place Watch your enquiry progress while we work to get you that answer View what weve helped with in the past with your closed enquiries   Appointments Book an appointment with a service you need and choose a time thats good for you Fill out pre-appointment forms online and give us the whole picture of your needs Message your appointment adviser to update them after your appointment has been made  Feedback Help shape the student experience by telling us what you think of Compass  Provide feedback through Compass on your enquiry or appointment
